name: ISS Technologies
tagline: Turn the digital disruption into your advantage
description:
Our journey started in 2002 as Information Technology reseller company based at Hyderabad. We have successfully served over 500 customers plus and constantly growing our reach with new products / services / verticals in India.
To deliver consistent excellent solutions to our customers we have Partnered with global leader includes Microsoft, Adobe, Symantec, Dell, HP and others.
Today we had diversified our business into Cloud services , Business Solution and Consulting -CRM, ERP, Mobility, Advance Security Solution and Digital marketing to meet customer requirement.
At ISS, Our team is motivated, passion-driven and extremely capable of managing a wide range of business. We empower our people toÂ make business decisions, innovative approach, out of box thinking, Our growth depends on our customer's success and employees satisfaction.
